data.value: , the split elements will expand out into separate columns. If NaN is present, it is propagated throughout the columns during the split.

data.out:
0     1     2        3         4
0                                           this    is     a  regular  sentence
1  https://docs.python.org/3/tutorial/index.html  None  None     None      None
2                                            NaN   NaN   NaN      NaN       NaN

data.value: For slightly more complex use cases like splitting the html document name from a url, a combination of parameter settings can be used.

data.out:
0           1
0          this is a regular sentence        None
1  https://docs.python.org/3/tutorial  index.html
2                                 NaN         NaN
